source: South Dakota Department of Veterans Affairs and national 211 network

resources.name: South Dakota Department of Veterans Affairs
resources.address: South Dakota Department of Veterans Affairs
resources.description: State agency providing comprehensive veteran services including state and federal benefits, compensation, education, healthcare, burial services, home loan guaranties, and the Michael J. Fitzmaurice State Veterans Home.

resources.name: 2-1-1 South Dakota Information and Referral Service
resources.description: Free, confidential helpline connecting veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food, legal aid, mental health services, and benefits assistance.

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line - National Support
resources.description: 24/7 confidential crisis support for veterans. Free support 365 days a year from trained professionals. No VA enrollment required.

resources.name: Michael J. Fitzmaurice State Veterans Home
resources.description: State-operated residential facility providing housing and care for eligible South Dakota veterans. Features various activities and comprehensive veteran support services.

resources.name: Fallen Heroes Bridge Dedication Program
resources.phone: Contact SD Department of Veterans Affairs
resources.description: Program honoring South Dakota service members killed or missing in action through bridge dedications. Over 72 bridges dedicated to 78 service members.

resources.name: Veterans of Foreign Wars - South Dakota Posts
resources.description: VFW membership organization providing VA claims assistance, financial grants, mental wellness support, and community programs. Free assistance from accredited service officers.

resources.name: American Legion - South Dakota Department
resources.description: National veteran service organization offering member benefits, community support, youth programs, and connections to state and federal benefits.

resources.name: VA Benefits Administration - South Dakota Region
resources.address: Regional VA offices throughout South Dakota
resources.description: Federal VA providing disability compensation, pension programs, GI Bill education, home loan assistance, vocational rehabilitation, and employment services.

resources.name: Operation Homefront - Military and Veteran Family Support
resources.description: National nonprofit providing emergency financial assistance for military and veteran families. Assistance with rent, utilities, food, and healthcare.

resources.name: VetsinTech - Veteran Technology Education and Employment
resources.description: 501(c)(3) nonprofit connecting veterans with technology education, employment, and entrepreneurship opportunities.
